data.text: An instrument for measuring blood pressure in the arteries, especially one consisting of a pressure gauge and a nylon or rubber cuff that wraps around the upper arm and inflates to constrict the arteries.
data.attributionText: from The American HeritageÂ® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: An instrument for measuring the tension of the blood in an artery.
A device used to measure <xref>blood pressure</xref>.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: a pressure gauge for measuring blood pressure
